eg.projects

Class SettingsWin

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.projects.SettingsWin

  • public class SettingsWin
extends java.lang.Object
    The window for the configuration of a project

    • Constructor Detail

      • SettingsWin

        public SettingsWin(java.lang.String fileKind,
                   java.lang.String moduleKind,
                   boolean useScrExec,
                   boolean useArgs,
                   java.lang.String buildKind)
        Creates a SettingsWin and defines which inputs are asked for.

        Parameters:
        fileKind - a description for the kind of file which a project is configured for. Is not null.
        moduleKind - a description for the kind of module (e.g. package/ directory relative to the project root). Null to skip asking for a module
        useScrExec - true to ask for the directories that contain source files and executables, respectively
        useArgs - true to ask for additional arguments of a start script
        buildKind - the name for the kind of build. Null to skip asking for a build
